name: Maze Puzzle Tilt Teeter Game
description:
The Maze Puzzle Tilt Game belongs to the skills and physical mixing.

The Maze Puzzle Tilt Game is very simple, shaking forum to find a way to get the ball to reach the destination!


Maze Puzzle Tilt Game is a fast and easy to play. Just tilt your iPhone Touch to move your ball through the labyrinth to the exit. Try your hand at different level that will test your balance and timing.

Maze Puzzle Tilt Game is Built with an advanced physics engine and OpenGL rendering for fast, smooth, realistic game play you'll love this little game. No configuration no instructions, no learning curve, just start and go.

Now Fast tilt Ball in Time game with ball. Let's trap the balls to find its destination or whole by control. Navigate and balance the smooth moving ball through the maze and try to clear all levels.


Move you device to achieve the goal.
